name: Naja - Pure
description:
Emphasizing the beauty of the beast.

Just like two sides of a coin, there’s always the one that shine, and there’s the one hiding behind the shadow.

Those who one-eyed the soul, who knows what the shadow holds? What treasure is left untold?

As the desire to be figured out is inevitable, this “project” is made as a coping mechanism to uncover  creator’s shadowed thoughts and emotions.

The title always simply tells about the artwork, the way to interpret and represent is up to you. The main idea is always the same, to see the beauty over the beast, it's just another side of beauty that is covered by the shadow.
